select to_char(nvl(max(to_number(serialno)),0)+1) serialno from CMS_jobrunlog
insert into CMS_jobrunlog (serialno, jobcode, jobplancode, startdate, runstate, makedate, makeuser, modifydate, modifyuser) values (#{serialno}, #{jobCode}, #{jobPlanCode}, TO_char(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{runState}, to_char(#{makeDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'system', to_char(#{modifyDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'system')
mapper.update: update CMS_jobrunlog a set a.enddate = TO_DATE(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), a.runstate = #{runState}, a.runresult = #{runResult}, a.modifydate = TO_DATE(#{modifyDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), a.modifyuser = 'system' where a.serialno = #{serialno}
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(max(a.startdate),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') successdate from CMS_jobrunlog a where 1 = 1 and a.runresult = '成功' and a.runstate = '1' and a.jobcode = #{jobCode}

select v.lastSuccessDate from (SELECT to_char(a.STARTDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') lastSuccessDate FROM CMS_jobrunlog a WHERE a.JOBCODE = #{jobCode} AND a.JOBPLANCODE = #{jobPlanCode} AND a.RUNSTATE = '1' AND a.RUNRESULT = '成功' ORDER BY a.SERIALNO DESC) v where rownum = 1
